fields.name: ReclamationExplanation
fields.fieldText:
As this part of the work cannot be completed, a Case will be created to notify the Installation Manager to take actions.

Please fill in details why the installation could not be completed. And define if there is need to order new part from the factory.

fields.name: New_part_needs_to_be_ordered_from_Factory
fields.fieldText: New part needs to be ordered from Factory

value.stringValue: You must add pictures regarding the issue

fields.name: Cannot_Complete_Warning
fields.fieldText:
This Work Order Line Item has been earlier closed in "Cannot Complete" status as there was some issue with it.


Please change status to "Completed" ONLY if the issue has been resolved and a replacing reclamation part is installed during this same visit.

fields.name: Error_No_Status_Transition_Available
fields.fieldText:
Status can not be Updated!

This Work Order Line Item is {!txtCurrentStatus}.

fields.name: DescriptionText
fields.fieldText: Please close the Service Appointment in "Cannot Complete" status and enter the mileage and correct end time.

variables.description: Reclamation Case that Installer fills in and sends when the WOLI cannot be completed. This means that Installation Manager needs to order new part(s) and new visit needs to be scheduled.
variables.name: CaseRecord

variables.description: Input value for the SA record from which this flow was started from.
variables.name: Id

variables.description: All Work Order Line Items that are related to the Work Order.
variables.name: RelatedWOLIs
